headline: Software Engineer with expertise in React, Node.js, and Cloud Technologies
summary: Experienced software engineer with a passion for building scalable web applications. Over 5 years of experience in full-stack development with a focus on React, Node.js, and AWS. Strong problem-solving skills and a track record of delivering high-quality software on time.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Led development of a microservices-based e-commerce platform, improving system reliability by 35%. Architected and implemented a real-time analytics dashboard using React, Redux, and WebSockets. Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews, improving team productivity by 25%. Optimized database queries and implemented caching strategies, reducing API response times by 40%.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed and maintained RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express, serving 100K+ daily users. Built responsive web applications using React and Material UI, improving user engagement by 20%. Implemented automated testing with Jest and Cypress, increasing code coverage to 85%. Collaborated with UX/UI designers to implement pixel-perfect interfaces and improve user experience.

experience.title: Junior Developer
experience.description: Contributed to frontend development using React and Redux for a SaaS product. Assisted in database design and implementation using MongoDB. Participated in agile development processes, including daily stand-ups and sprint planning.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: GPA: 3.8/4.0. Relevant Coursework: Data Structures, Algorithms, Database Systems, Web Development.

projects.name: Personal Finance Dashboard
projects.description: Built a full-stack application using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Implemented data visualization with D3.js and real-time updates with WebSockets. Deployed using Docker and AWS, with CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions.

projects.name: Open Source Contribution
projects.description: Active contributor to several open-source projects on GitHub. Created and maintained a popular npm package with 10K+ weekly downloads. Presented at local meetups and conferences on modern web development techniques.
